title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 70.3 - Definitions pertaining to this chapter
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 70.3 - Definitions pertaining to this chapter

State Regulations
(a) A class shall mean a category of
facilities subject to the issuance of an operating certificate and
distinguished by certain common characteristics of persons served, programs of
services provided, staff skills, and premises. (b) An operating certificate shall mean a
written document, pertinent to the appropriate class, conveying to the public
the authorization by the commissioner of a provider of services to operate
programs stated thereon through specified facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
70.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
